script:

RIGHT AWAY Wait until you're

library, PDF versions, or
upperclassmen first totally

"Slide 4: REMEMBER: EVERYONE'S
FIGURING IT OUT No one actually

"Slide 6: PRIORITIZE SLEEP OVER

"Slide 7: USE STUDY TOOLS I use
